name: Video Grid 5
liquid_code:
<link
  rel="stylesheet"
  href="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@11/swiper-bundle.min.css"
/>

{%- liquid 
  assign padding_horizontal = section.settings.padding_horizontal
  assign padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign padding_top = section.settings.padding_top
  assign padding_bottom = section.settings.padding_bottom
  assign border_color = section.settings.border_color
  assign border_thickness = section.settings.border_thickness
  assign margin_top = section.settings.margin_top
  assign margin_bottom = section.settings.margin_bottom
  assign margin_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.margin_horizontal_mobile
  assign margin_horizontal = section.settings.margin_horizontal
  assign background_color = section.settings.background_color
  assign background_gradient = section.settings.background_gradient
  assign full_width = section.settings.full_width
  assign content_width = section.settings.content_width
  assign lazy = section.settings.lazy
  assign section_radius = section.settings.section_radius

  assign content_padding_horizontal = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal
  assign content_padding_horizontal_mobile = section.settings.content_padding_horizontal_mobile
  assign content_align = section.settings.content_align
  assign content_align_mobile = section.settings.content_align_mobile

  assign cards_gap = section.settings.cards_gap
  assign cards_gap_mobile = section.settings.cards_gap_mobile
  assign cards_mt = section.settings.cards_mt
  assign cards_mt_mobile = section.settings.cards_mt_mobile

  assign card_height_mobile = section.settings.card_height_mobile
  assign card_height = section.settings.card_height
  assign card_radius = section.settings.card_radius
  assign card_border_thickness = section.settings.card_border_thickness
  assign card_border_color = section.settings.card_border_color
  assign card_content_align = section.settings.card_content_align
  assign card_content_align_mobile = section.settings.card_content_align_mobile
  assign card_overlay = section.settings.card_overlay
  assign card_overlay_color = section.settings.card_overlay_color

  assign text_custom = section.settings.text_custom
  assign text_font = section.settings.text_font
  assign text_size = section.settings.text_size
  assign text_size_mobile = section.settings.text_size_mobile
  assign text_height = section.settings.text_height
  assign text_color = section.settings.text_color

  assign title_custom = section.settings.title_custom
  assign title_font = section.settings.title_font
  assign title_size = section.settings.title_size
  assign title_size_mobile = section.settings.title_size_mobile
  assign title_height = section.settings.title_height
  assign title_color = section.settings.title_color

  assign zoom_size = section.settings.zoom_size
  assign zoom_size_mobile = section.settings.zoom_size_mobile
  assign zoom_radius = section.settings.zoom_radius
  assign zoom_color = section.settings.zoom_color
  assign zoom_bg_color = section.settings.zoom_bg_color

  assign modal_overlay_color = section.settings.modal_overlay_color

  assign modal_video_border_thickness = section.settings.modal_video_border_thickness
  assign modal_video_border_color = section.settings.modal_video_border_color
  assign modal_video_radius = section.settings.modal_video_radius

  assign modal_close_bg_color = section.settings.modal_close_bg_color
  assign modal_close_bg_hover_color = section.settings.modal_close_bg_hover_color
  assign modal_close_icon_color = section.settings.modal_close_icon_color
  assign modal_close_icon_hover_color = section.settings.modal_close_icon_hover_color

  assign modal_close_radius = section.settings.modal_close_radius
  assign modal_close_icon_size = section.settings.modal_close_icon_size
  assign modal_close_icon_size_mobile = section.settings.modal_close_icon_size_mobile

  assign lazy_load_setting = 'lazy'
  unless lazy
    assign lazy_load_setting = 'eiger'
  endunless
-%}

{%- style -%}
  {{ text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  {{ title_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}

  .section-{{ section.id }} {
    border-top: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    border-bottom: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    margin-top: {{ margin_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    border-radius: {{ section_radius | times: 0.6 | round: 0 }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }
  
  .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
    margin: 0 auto;
    padding-top: {{ padding_top | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom | times: 0.75 | round: 0 }}px;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem;
  }

  .video-grid-cards-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px;
    gap: {{ cards_gap_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-grid-slider-{{ section.id }} {
    display: flex !important;
    margin-top: {{ cards_mt_mobile }}px !important;
    margin-right: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    margin-left: -{{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
    padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal_mobile }}rem !important;
  } 

  .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }} {
    border: {{ card_border_thickness }}px solid {{ card_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ card_radius }}px;
    transition: all 0.45s ease 0s;
    height: {{ card_height_mobile }}px !important;
    box-sizing: border-box !important;
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}:after {
    position: absolute;
    content: '';
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    z-index: 1;
    background-color: {{ card_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: card_overlay }};
  }

  .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}.swiper-slide-active .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 1;
    transform: translateY(0px);
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-grid-media-{{ section.id }} {
    height: 100%;
    width: 100%;
  }

  .video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }},
  .video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }} img,
  .video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }} svg,
  .video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} video,
  .video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    border: 0px;
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }} svg {
    background-color: #AFAFAF;
  }

  .video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
  }

  .video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
  }

  .video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: block;
  }
  
  .video-grid-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    height: 100%;
    top: 0;
    left: 0;
    padding: 16px;
    display: flex;
    flex-direction: column;
    justify-content: space-between;
    gap: 10px;
    z-index: 2;
  }

  .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
  }

  .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} * {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ text_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ text_color }};
    line-height: {{ text_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
  }

  .video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }} {
    margin: 0;
    font-size: {{ title_size_mobile }}px;
    color: {{ title_color }};
    line-height: {{ title_height }}%;
    text-transform: unset;
    text-decoration: none;
    word-break: break-word;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    text-align: {{ card_content_align_mobile }};
    font-weight: 700;
  }
  
  .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
    opacity: 0;
    max-width: calc(100% - {{ zoom_size_mobile | plus: 28 }}px);
    transform: translateY(-20px);
    transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    top: 16px;
    right: 16px;
    z-index: 2;
    cursor: pointer;
    width: {{ zoom_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ zoom_size_mobile }}px;
    box-sizing: content-box;
    background-color: {{ zoom_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.4 }};
    padding: 10px;
    border-radius: {{ zoom_radius }}px;
    opacity: 1;
    transition: all 0.1s ease 0s;
    -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
    backdrop-filter: blur(12px);
  }

  .video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }}:hover {
    background-color: {{ zoom_bg_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.6 }};
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }} svg {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
  }

  .video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }} svg path {
    fill: {{ zoom_color }};
  }

  .video-grid-modal-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100vw;
    height: 100vh;
    position: fixed;
    bottom: 0; 
    right: 0; 
    display: flex;
    align-items: center; 
    justify-content: center; 
    opacity: 0;
    overflow: hidden;
    pointer-events: none;
    padding: 20px;
    transition: opacity 0.3s ease;
    background: {{ modal_overlay_color | hex_to_rgba: 0.5}};
    z-index: -1;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-{{ section.id }}.active {
    opacity: 1;
    z-index: 100;
    pointer-events: all;
    transition: all 250ms ease-in 0s;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
    position: relative;
    max-height: 70vh;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    padding: 0;
    margin: 0;
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }} {
    display: none;
    height: 100%;    
    position: relative;
    overflow: hidden;   
    width: 100%;
    align-items: center;
    justify-content: center;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-video-element-{{ section.id }} {
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-video-element-{{ section.id }} {
    border: {{ modal_video_border_thickness }}px solid {{ modal_video_border_color }};
    border-radius: {{ modal_video_radius }}px;
    overflow: hidden;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }}.active {
    display: flex;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }} video,
  .video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }} iframe {
    display: block;
    width: 100%;
    height: 100%;
    object-fit: cover;
    border: 0px;
    box-shadow: none;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} {
    position: absolute;
    bottom: -10%;
    left: 50%;
    transform: translateX(-50%); 
    display: flex;
    align-items: center;
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }  

  .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg rect {
    transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
  }

  .portrait-video-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: 100%;
    margin: 0px auto;
  }

  .landspace-video-{{ section.id }} {
    max-width: 100%;
    margin: 0px auto;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} {
    padding: {{ modal_close_icon_size_mobile | times: 0.5 }}px;
    border-radius: {{ modal_close_radius }}px;
    background-color: {{ modal_close_bg_color }};    
  }  

  .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg {
    width: {{ modal_close_icon_size_mobile }}px;
    height: {{ modal_close_icon_size_mobile }}px;
  }

  .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg rect {
    fill: {{ modal_close_icon_color }};
  }

  @media(min-width: 1024px) {

    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      margin-top: {{ margin_top }}px;
      margin-bottom: {{ margin_bottom }}px;
      margin-left: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      margin-right: {{ margin_horizontal }}rem;
      border-radius: {{ section_radius }}px;
    }
    
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      padding: 0 5rem;
      padding-top: {{ padding_top }}px;
      padding-bottom: {{ padding_bottom }}px;
      padding-left: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
      padding-right: {{ padding_horizontal }}rem;
    }

    .video-grid-cards-{{ section.id }} {
      display: flex;
      margin-top: {{ cards_mt }}px;
      gap: {{ cards_gap }}px;
    }

    .video-grid-slider-{{ section.id }} {
      display: none !important;
    }

    .video-grid-card-content-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: 16px 24px;
    }
    
    .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }} {
      height: {{ card_height }}px !important;
      flex: 1 1 0 !important;
    }

    .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      flex: 2 !important;
      transition: all 0.45s ease 0s;
    }
    
    .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 1;      
      overflow: visible;
      transform: translateY(0px);
      transition: all 0.1s ease 0.4s;
    }

    .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: calc(100% - {{ zoom_size | plus: 30 }}px);
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }};
      overflow: hidden;
    }

    .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-size: {{ text_size }}px;
    }
    
    .video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }} {
      text-align: {{ card_content_align }};
      font-size: {{ title_size }}px;
    }

    .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}.hide-{{ section.id }} .video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 0;
    }

    .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}.active .video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 1;
    }

    .video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 0;
      width: {{ zoom_size }}px;
      height: {{ zoom_size }}px;
    }

    .video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}:hover .video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }} {
      opacity: 1;
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0.5s;
    }

    .video-grid-modal-inner-{{ section.id }} {
      max-height: 95vh;
      height: 100%;
      padding: 20px;
    } 
      
    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} {
      position: absolute;
      top: 0px;
      bottom: unset;
      left: 98%;
      cursor: pointer;
      transform: translateX(-50%);
    }

    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }}:hover { 
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }
    
    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }}:hover svg rect {
      transition: all 0.25s ease 0s;
    }    

    .portrait-video-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 40%;
    }

    .landspace-video-{{ section.id }} {
      max-width: 80%;
    }

    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} {
      padding: {{ modal_close_icon_size | times: 0.5 }}px;
    }

    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }}:hover {
      background-color: {{ modal_close_bg_hover_color }};    
    }
    
    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }}:hover svg rect {
      fill: {{ modal_close_icon_hover_color }};
    }
    
    .video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }} svg {
      width: {{ modal_close_icon_size }}px;
      height: {{ modal_close_icon_size }}px;
    }
  }
  
{%- endstyle -%}

{% unless full_width %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }}-settings {
      max-width: {{ content_width }}px;
    }
  </style>
{% endunless %}

{% if margin_horizontal_mobile > 0 %}
  <style>
    .section-{{ section.id }} {
      border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
    }
    
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: 0px;
        border-right: 0px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if margin_horizontal > 0 %}
  <style>
    @media(min-width: 1024px) {
      .section-{{ section.id }} {
        border-left: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
        border-right: solid {{ border_color }} {{ border_thickness }}px;
      }
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if text_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }} * {
      font-family: {{ text_font.family }}, {{ text_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ text_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ text_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% if title_custom %}
  <style>
    .video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }} {
      font-family: {{ title_font.family }}, {{ title_font.fallback_families }};
      font-weight: {{ title_font.weight }};
      font-style: {{ title_font.style }};
    }
  </style>
{% endif %}

{% for block in section.blocks %}
  {% case block.type %}
    {% when 'heading' %}
      <style>
        {{ block.settings.heading_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
 
        .video-grid-heading-{{ block.id }} {
          padding: 0 {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}%;
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
        }

        .video-grid-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.heading_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.heading_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 700;
        }
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .video-grid-heading-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0 {{ content_padding_horizontal }}%;
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.heading_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
          }
        
          .video-grid-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.heading_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>
      {% if block.settings.heading_custom %}
        <style>
          .video-grid-heading-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.heading_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.heading_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.heading_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.heading_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}

    {% when 'text' %}
      <style>
        {{ block.settings.text_font | font_face: font_display: 'swap' }}
  
        .video-grid-text-{{ block.id }} {
          padding: 0 {{ content_padding_horizontal_mobile }}%;
          margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt_mobile }}px;
          text-align: {{ content_align_mobile }};
        }

        .video-grid-text-{{ block.id }} * {
          margin: 0;
          font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size_mobile }}px;
          color: {{ block.settings.text_color }};
          line-height: {{ block.settings.text_height }}%;
          text-transform: unset;
          text-decoration: none;
          word-break: break-word;
          font-weight: 400;
        }
        @media(min-width: 1024px) {
          .video-grid-text-{{ block.id }} {
            padding: 0 {{ content_padding_horizontal }}%;
            margin-top: {{ block.settings.text_mt }}px;
            text-align: {{ content_align }};
          }
        
          .video-grid-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-size: {{ block.settings.text_size }}px;
          }
        }
      </style>
      {% if block.settings.text_custom %}
        <style>
          .video-grid-text-{{ block.id }} * {
            font-family: {{ block.settings.text_font.family }}, {{ block.settings.text_font.fallback_families }};
            font-weight: {{ block.settings.text_font.weight }};
            font-style: {{ block.settings.text_font.style }};
          }
        </style>
      {% endif %}
    {% else %}      
  {% endcase %}
{% endfor %}

<div class="section-{{ section.id }} vidoe-grid-{{ section.id }}" style="background-color:{{ background_color }}; background-image: {{ background_gradient }};">
    <div class="section-{{ section.id }}-settings">
      {% for block in section.blocks %}
        {% case block.type %}
          {% when 'heading' %}
            {% if block.settings.heading != blank %}
              <div class="video-grid-heading-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.heading }}</div>
            {% endif %}
          {% when 'text' %}
            {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
              <div class="video-grid-text-{{ block.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
            {% endif %}
          {% else %}
            
        {% endcase %}
      {% endfor %}
      <div class="video-grid-cards-{{ section.id }}">
        {% for block in section.blocks %}
          {% if block.type == 'video' %}
            <div class="video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}">
              <div class="video-grid-media-{{ section.id }}">
                <div class="video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }} active">
                  {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                    {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                      {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 750 | image_tag:
                        loading: lazy_load_setting,
                        sizes: sizes,
                        widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
                      }}                    
                  {% else %}
                    {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                  {% endif %}  
                </div>
                <div class="video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
                  {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                  {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                  {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                  <iframe
                    src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"    
                    data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"      
                    data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&playsinline=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"                  
                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                    allowfullscreen
                    class="lazy"
                  ></iframe>
                  {%- else -%}
                  <iframe
                    src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"    
                    data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                    data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&controls=0&playsinline=0&shinfo=0{{ loop }}"        
                    allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                    allowzoomscreen
                     playsinline
                    class="lazy"
                  ></iframe>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% else %}
                    {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                    <video data-src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" muted autoplay playsinline loop preload="none" preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
                  {% endif %} 
                </div>
              </div>
              <div class="video-grid-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                  <div class="video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                {% endif %}
                {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                  <p class="video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                {% endif %}
              </div>

              <div class="video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }}" id="{{ block.id }}">
                <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="text-white"><g clip-path="url(#clip0_11035_329)"><path d="M9.92005 4.76133C9.92005 5.24886 10.3189 5.64775 10.8065 5.64775H13.1023L5.00928 13.7408C4.66357 14.0865 4.66357 14.6449 5.00928 14.9906C5.35498 15.3363 5.91343 15.3363 6.25913 14.9906L14.3522 6.8976V9.19343C14.3522 9.68096 14.751 10.0799 15.2386 10.0799C15.7261 10.0799 16.125 9.68096 16.125 9.19343V3.87488L10.8065 3.87491C10.3189 3.87491 9.92005 4.2738 9.92005 4.76133Z" fill="#FEFCF5"></path><path d="M10.0799 15.2384C10.0799 14.7509 9.68106 14.352 9.19353 14.352L6.8977 14.352L14.9907 6.25901C15.3364 5.9133 15.3364 5.35486 14.9907 5.00915C14.645 4.66345 14.0866 4.66345 13.7409 5.00915L5.64784 13.1022L5.64784 10.8063C5.64784 10.3188 5.24895 9.91991 4.76142 9.91991C4.27389 9.91991 3.875 10.3188 3.875 10.8063L3.875 16.1249L9.19353 16.1248C9.68106 16.1248 10.0799 15.726 10.0799 15.2384Z" fill="#FEFCF5"></path></g><defs><clipPath id="clip0_11035_329"><rect width="14" height="14" fill="white" transform="translate(3 3)"></rect></clipPath></defs></svg>
              </div>
            </div>
          {% endif %}
        {% endfor %}
      </div>
      <div class="video-grid-slider-{{ section.id }} swiper"
        data-gap-mobile="{{ cards_gap_mobile }}">
        <div class="swiper-wrapper">
          {% for block in section.blocks %}
            {% if block.type == 'video' %}
              <div class="video-grid-card-{{ section.id }} swiper-slide" id="{{ block.id }}">
                <div class="video-grid-media-{{ section.id }}">
                  <div class="video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }} active">
                    {% if block.settings.image != blank %}
                      {%- capture sizes -%}(min-width: {{ content_width }}px) {{ content_width | minus: 100 | divided_by: 2 }}px, (min-width: 750px) calc((100vw - 130px) / 2), calc((100vw - 50px) / 2){%- endcapture -%}
                        {{ block.settings.image | image_url: width: 1000 | image_tag:
                          loading: lazy_load_setting,
                          sizes: sizes,
                          widths: '750, 1070, 1500'
                        }}                    
                    {% else %}
                      {{ 'image' | placeholder_svg_tag }}
                    {% endif %}  
                  </div>
                  <div class="video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }}">
                    {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
                    {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
                    {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
                    {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                    <iframe
                      src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"    
                      data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"      
                      data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&playsinline=0&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"                  
                      allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                      allowfullscreen
                      class="lazy"
                    ></iframe>
                    {%- else -%}
                    <iframe
                      src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=0&modestbranding=1&showinfo=0&rel=0{{ loop }}"    
                      data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=0&playsinline=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                      data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=0&controls=0&playsinline=0&shinfo=0{{ loop }}"        
                      allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                      allowzoomscreen
                       playsinline
                      class="lazy"
                    ></iframe>
                    {% endif %}
                    {% else %}
                      {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
                      <video data-src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" muted autoplay playsinline loop preload="none" preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
                    {% endif %} 
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="video-grid-card-content-{{ section.id }}">
                  {% if block.settings.text != blank %}
                    <div class="video-grid-card-text-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.text }}</div>
                  {% endif %}
                  {% if block.settings.title != blank %}
                    <p class="video-grid-card-title-{{ section.id }}">{{ block.settings.title }}</p>
                  {% endif %}
                </div>
                <div class="video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }}" id="{{ block.id }}">
                  <svg viewBox="0 0 20 20" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="text-white"><g clip-path="url(#clip0_11035_329)"><path d="M9.92005 4.76133C9.92005 5.24886 10.3189 5.64775 10.8065 5.64775H13.1023L5.00928 13.7408C4.66357 14.0865 4.66357 14.6449 5.00928 14.9906C5.35498 15.3363 5.91343 15.3363 6.25913 14.9906L14.3522 6.8976V9.19343C14.3522 9.68096 14.751 10.0799 15.2386 10.0799C15.7261 10.0799 16.125 9.68096 16.125 9.19343V3.87488L10.8065 3.87491C10.3189 3.87491 9.92005 4.2738 9.92005 4.76133Z" fill="#FEFCF5"></path><path d="M10.0799 15.2384C10.0799 14.7509 9.68106 14.352 9.19353 14.352L6.8977 14.352L14.9907 6.25901C15.3364 5.9133 15.3364 5.35486 14.9907 5.00915C14.645 4.66345 14.0866 4.66345 13.7409 5.00915L5.64784 13.1022L5.64784 10.8063C5.64784 10.3188 5.24895 9.91991 4.76142 9.91991C4.27389 9.91991 3.875 10.3188 3.875 10.8063L3.875 16.1249L9.19353 16.1248C9.68106 16.1248 10.0799 15.726 10.0799 15.2384Z" fill="#FEFCF5"></path></g><defs><clipPath id="clip0_11035_329"><rect width="14" height="14" fill="white" transform="translate(3 3)"></rect></clipPath></defs></svg>
                </div>
              </div>
            {% endif %}
          {% endfor %}
        </div>
     
      </div>
    </div>
</div>

<div class="video-grid-modal-{{ section.id }}">
  <div class="video-grid-modal-inner-{{ section.id }}">
    {% for block in section.blocks %}
      {% if block.type == 'video' %}
        <div class="video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }}" data-id="{{ block.id }}">
            {% assign video_id = block.settings.video.id | default: block.settings.video_url.id %}
            {% assign loop = '&loop=1&playlist=' | append: video_id %}
            {%- if block.settings.video == null and block.settings.video_url != null -%}
              <div class="video-grid-modal-video-element-{{ section.id }}">
              {%- if block.settings.video_url.type == 'youtube' -%}
                <iframe         
                  {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src1="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=1&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src2="https://www.youtube.com/embed/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&autoplay=0&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"      
                  allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                  allowzoomscreen
                  class="lazy"
                ></iframe>
                {%- else -%}
                <iframe
                  {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=0&autoplay=1&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src1="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=1&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  data-src2="https://player.vimeo.com/video/{{ video_id }}?enablejsapi=1&mute=1&muted=1&autoplay=0&controls=1&showinfo=0{{ loop }}"
                  allow="accelerometer; autoplay; encrypted-media; gyroscope; picture-in-picture"
                  allowzoomscreen
                  class="lazy"
                ></iframe>
              {% endif %}
            </div>
          {% else %}
            {% assign width_video = block.settings.video.sources[0].width %}
            {% assign height_video = block.settings.video.sources[0].height %}
            <div class="video-grid-modal-video-element-{{ section.id }} {% if height_video > width_video %}portrait-video-{{ section.id }}{% else %}landscape-video-{{ section.id }}{% endif %}">
              {% assign placeholder_video = 'https://cdn.shopify.com/videos/c/o/v/fbb140fd46e3429eba459e1549dbbe38.mp4' %}
              <video  {% if lazy %}data-{% endif %}src="{% if block.settings.video != blank %}{{ block.settings.video.sources[1].url }}{% else %}{{ placeholder_video }}{% endif %}" controls autoplay playsinline loop preload="none" preload="none" loop class="lazy"></video>
            </div>
          {% endif %}       
        </div>
      {% endif %}
    {% endfor %}
    <div class="video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }}">
      <svg viewBox="0 0 22 24" fill="none" xmlns="http://www.w3.org/2000/svg" class="w-5 text-white"><rect x="1.25391" y="19.4238" width="25" height="4" transform="rotate(-45 1.25391 19.4238)" fill="currentColor"></rect><rect x="4.08203" y="1.74609" width="25" height="4" transform="rotate(45 4.08203 1.74609)" fill="currentColor"></rect></svg>
    </div>
  </div>
</div>


<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/swiper@8/swiper-bundle.min.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/npm/vanilla-lazyload@19.1.3/dist/lazyload.min.js"></script>

<script>
  function initVideoGrid5() {
    let lazyLoadInstance = new LazyLoad();

    window.addEventListener(
      "LazyLoad::Initialized",
      function (event) {
        window.lazyLoadInstance = event.detail.instance;
      },
      false
    );

    const slider = new Swiper(`.video-grid-slider-{{ section.id }}`, {
      speed: 300,
      spaceBetween: parseInt(document.querySelector(`.video-grid-slider-{{ section.id }}`).dataset.gapMobile || 0),
      slidesPerView: 1.2,
    });

    const modal = document.querySelector('.video-grid-modal-{{ section.id }}');

    function handleDesktopBehavior(item) {
      const videoWrapper = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }}');
      const image = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }}');
      const cardVideo = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }}');
      const video = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} video');
      const iframe = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} iframe');

      item.addEventListener('mouseenter', () => {
        const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}');
        cards.forEach(el => {     
          if(item != el) {
            el.classList.add('hide-{{ section.id }}')    
          }                   
        });

        cardVideo.classList.add('active');
        item.classList.add('active');
        if (image) {
          image.classList.remove('active');
        } 

        if (video && video.paused) {
          try {
            const playPromise = video.play();
            if (playPromise !== undefined) {
              playPromise.catch(err => console.warn('Play interrupted:', err));
            }
            videoWrapper.classList.add('active');
          } catch (err) {
            console.warn('Video play error:', err);
          }
        }

        if (iframe) {
          iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src1');
        }
      });

      item.addEventListener('mouseleave', () => {
        const cards = document.querySelectorAll('.video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}');
        cards.forEach(el => el.classList.remove('hide-{{ section.id }}'));

        cardVideo.classList.remove('active');
        item.classList.remove('active');
        if (image) image.classList.add('active');

        if (video) {
          video.pause();
          video.currentTime = 0;
          videoWrapper.classList.remove('active');
        }

        if (iframe) {
          iframe.src = iframe.getAttribute('data-src2');
        }
      });
    }

    function handleMobileBehavior(item) {
      const videoWrapper = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }}');
      const image = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-image-{{ section.id }}');
      const video = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} video');
      const iframe = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-video-{{ section.id }} iframe');

      item.addEventListener('click', () => {
        const isActive = videoWrapper.classList.contains('active');
        if (image) image.classList.toggle('active', isActive);

        if (video) {
          if (isActive) {
            video.pause();
            video.currentTime = 0;
          } else if (video.paused) {
            try {
              const playPromise = video.play();
              if (playPromise !== undefined) {
                playPromise.catch(err => console.warn('Play interrupted:', err));
              }
            } catch (err) {
              console.warn('Video play error:', err);
            }
          }
          videoWrapper.classList.toggle('active');
        }

        if (iframe) {
          iframe.src = isActive ? iframe.dataset.src2 : iframe.dataset.src1;
          videoWrapper.classList.toggle('active');
        }
      });
    }

    function applyBehavior() {
      const isMobile = window.innerWidth <= 768;

      document.querySelectorAll('.video-grid-card-{{ section.id }}').forEach(item => {
        const itemzoom = item.querySelector('.video-grid-card-zoom-{{ section.id }}');

        if (isMobile) {
          handleMobileBehavior(item);

          itemzoom.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const itemId = itemzoom.id;
            const modalVideo = document.querySelector(`.video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${itemId}"]`);

            if (modalVideo) {
              setTimeout(() => {
                const videoTag = modalVideo.querySelector('video');
                const iframeTag = modalVideo.querySelector('iframe');
                if (videoTag && videoTag.paused) {
                  try {
                    const playPromise = videoTag.play();
                    if (playPromise !== undefined) {
                      playPromise.catch(err => console.warn('Modal video play interrupted:', err));
                    }
                  } catch (err) {
                    console.warn('Modal video play error:', err);
                  }
                }
                if (iframeTag) {
                  iframeTag.src = iframeTag.getAttribute("data-src1");
                }

                document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
                modal.classList.add('active');
                modalVideo.classList.add('active');
              }, 400);
            }
          });

        } else {
          handleDesktopBehavior(item);

          itemzoom.addEventListener('click', () => {
            const itemId = itemzoom.id;
            const modalVideo = document.querySelector(`.video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }}[data-id="${itemId}"]`);

            if (modalVideo) {
              setTimeout(() => {
                const videoTag = modalVideo.querySelector('video');
                const iframeTag = modalVideo.querySelector('iframe');
                if (videoTag && videoTag.paused) {
                  try {
                    const playPromise = videoTag.play();
                    if (playPromise !== undefined) {
                      playPromise.catch(err => console.warn('Modal video play interrupted:', err));
                    }
                  } catch (err) {
                    console.warn('Modal video play error:', err);
                  }
                }
                if (iframeTag) {
                  iframeTag.src = iframeTag.getAttribute("data-src1");
                }

                document.body.style.overflow = 'hidden';
                modal.classList.add('active');
                modalVideo.classList.add('active');
              }, 400);
            }
          });
        }
      });
    }

    const closeModal = document.querySelector('.video-grid-modal-close-{{ section.id }}');
    if (closeModal) {
      closeModal.addEventListener('click', () => {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
        modal.classList.remove('active');
        document.querySelectorAll('.video-grid-modal-video-{{ section.id }}').forEach(video => {
          const videoTag = video.querySelector('video');
          const iframeTag = video.querySelector('iframe');
          if (videoTag) {
            videoTag.pause();
          }
          if (iframeTag) {
            iframeTag.src = iframeTag.dataset.src2;
          }
          video.classList.remove('active');
        });
      });
    }

    applyBehavior();
    window.addEventListener('resize', applyBehavior);

    document.addEventListener('click', (e) => {
      if (e.target == modal) {
        document.body.style.overflow = '';
        modal.classList.remove('active');
        let frames = modal.querySelectorAll('iframe');
        let videos = modal.querySelectorAll('video');
        if (frames) {
          frames.forEach(el => {
            el.src = el.getAttribute('data-src1');
          });
        }
        if (videos) {
          videos.forEach(el => {
            el.pause();
          });
        }
      }
    });
  }

  document.addEventListener('DOMContentLoaded', initVideoGrid5);

  if (Shopify.designMode) {
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:unload', initVideoGrid5);
    document.addEventListener('shopify:section:load', initVideoGrid5);
  }
</script>
